translation.en: [gruff voice] Armageddon will launch in one minute.
translation.it: Un minuto al lancio di Armageddon.

translation.en: [girl] Tony, how are we gonna do this in time?
translation.it: Tony, come faremo a fare in tempo?

translation.en: -We need to get across that gap. -But we'll be spotted by the guards.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo passare da lì. - Ci vedranno. Non è possibile.

translation.en: -We won't make it. -Can you just trust me?
translation.it: - Dobbiamo passare da lì. - Ci vedranno. Non è possibile. - Ti fidi di me o no? - Sinceramente? No. Non posso.

translation.en: Honestly? No, I can't trust you.
translation.it: - Ti fidi di me o no? - Sinceramente? No. Non posso.

translation.en: Well, we're going anyway. Activate Magna Boots. Activated.
translation.it: - Beh, pazienza. Attiviamo i Magna Boots. - Fatto.

translation.en: -[Tony] Look out. Guards. -[girl] Sh!
-I need eyes in the hall. -On it.
Bronson, surveillance mode.
Tony, we gotta hurry!
Locked out. Again.
This is where we're supposed to complete the mission! If we get to this elevator, we can stop the countdown.
translation.it: - Ma dobbiamo finire la missione! - Dobbiamo prendere questo ascensore.

translation.en: Tony, the world as we know it ends in 15 seconds.
translation.it: Al mondo che conosciamo restano 15 secondi!

translation.en: [gruff voice] You will never stop Armageddon. Run to the elevator.
Do it again!
I think you were right, Patty. About what?
translation.it: - Mi sa che avevi ragione, Patty. - Su cosa?

translation.en: We're not gonna make it.
Rat Thickskull, don't let me down.
You know, back in my day, a card up the sleeve was called cheating.
translation.it: Ai miei tempi, quello era barare.

translation.en: Morning, Dad. I'm learning a new magic trick. Oh, is that right?
translation.it: - Ciao, papà. È un nuovo trucco di magia. - Sì?

translation.en: I never cheat. I use creative sportsmanship.
translation.it: Io non baro mai. La mia è sportività creativa.

translation.en: [giggles] Oh, that's very clever. Where'd you get that term? -From you. -[gasps]
From me?! Oh, no, no. That's impossible. Deception is not a part of my vocabulary. [clicks tongue]
translation.it: Da me? Impossibile. L'inganno non è nel mio stile.

translation.en: Don't you like your overnight oats?
Blame your dad. Uh, excuse me. What's going on here?
translation.it: - È colpa di tuo padre. - Che succede qui?

translation.en: Computers, games, devices are only allowed between 4:00 and 6:00 p.m.
translation.it: La tecnologia è ammessa tra le 16:00 e le 18:00.

translation.en: -We know this. -She just needs it for a minute.
I'm looking for an animal photo to make my science paper look extra nice.
translation.it: Cerco foto di animali per la mia ricerca di scienze.

translation.en: Oh, well, as long as it's for schoolwork, then I guess it's okay.
translation.it: Se è per la scuola, allora va bene.

translation.en: As soon as she's done, we lock that up, and then please meet me in our office.
translation.it: Appena finisce, mettilo via. Ti aspetto nello studio.

translation.en: Aw, look at that cute little starfish.
I need your permission to download it.
Mm-hmm. I'm very impressed with how honest you are, sweetheart.
Yep. I always wanna be super honest.
Just like you.
Switchsies. Thank you, my love.
-Morning, Mom. -Hey.
-Games? -I gotta practice for tonight.
Do you wanna get busted? Nobody catches Rat.
translation.it: - Vuoi farti beccare? - Rat non si fa mai beccare.

translation.en: -Stop talking like Rat Thickskull. -Someday, I'm gonna be Rat Thickskull.
translation.it: - Non parlare come Rat Thickskull. - Un giorno sarò come lui.

translation.en: Really?
-[fingers crack] -All right. Authorizing Armageddon Code.
Syncing Armageddon Code.
And Armageddon Code sunk.
Oh, hey, hey, hey, hey, hey! Come here. Hey. [chuckles] What?
Happy anniversary. Operation Fireball?
translation.it: Buon anniversario. L'Operazione Palla di Fuoco?

translation.en: How could I forget our greatest mission yet?
-You did remember. -Well, my watch did anyway.
translation.it: - Te ne sei ricordato. - Beh, l'orologio.

translation.en: We also promised that it was this anniversary we were finally gonna tell our kids that we're spies.
translation.it: Avevamo deciso di dire ai bambini che siamo spie, oggi.

translation.en: -Remember? -Yeah, yeah, yeah, we did.
translation.it: - Te lo ricordi? - Sì, è vero.

translation.en: I say we go in and say, "Tonight, we're gonna have an important talk."
-And I'm gonna take the lead on that. -Oh no. N… I know what you're doing.
translation.it: Ci penso io. Oh, no. So che cerchi di distrarmi ballando.

translation.en: -Trying to dance your way out of this one. -I would never!
translation.it: Oh, no. So che cerchi di distrarmi ballando. - Giammai! - Come osi? Niente tango.

translation.en: How dare you tango with me!
[mom] You know I love it when you dance with me.
translation.it: - Ti sbagli. - Sai che amo ballare.

translation.en: -Let's go talk to the kids. -Okay.
-Antonio. -Hi.
Oh good. It's locked. Just making sure.
You know better than to fry your brain with video games before school.
translation.it: Non friggerti il cervello giocando prima di andare a scuola.

translation.en: For breaking the rules and stealing my key,
translation.it: Hai disobbedito e rubato la chiave,

translation.en: you will have no access to any tech of any kind for the rest of the week.
translation.it: perciò niente tecnologia per tutta la settimana.

translation.en: Okay. Now tell them.
Kids.
Onward to the house of learning!
-Nice leading. -We can tell 'em next year.
translation.it: - Ben fatto. - Sarà per l'anno prossimo.

translation.en: -We've said that since they were four. -[dad] Here we go!
translation.it: - Lo dici da quando avevano quattro anni. - Si parte!

translation.en: Tony keeps getting around our restrictions, so we have to ban all of their technology.
translation.it: Tony aggira le restrizioni, dovremo bandire tutta la tecnologia.

translation.en: They need time to enjoy the things they love.
translation.it: Devono poter fare ciò che amano.

translation.en: Babe, we can't risk someone breaking into our system through our kids' devices, okay?
translation.it: Qualcuno potrebbe violare il sistema tramite i loro dispositivi.

translation.en: There are spies everywhere.
Agent Torrez. Agent Tango.
Morning, Devlin. So what's the mission for today?
translation.it: - Buongiorno, Devlin. - Qual è la missione?

translation.en: An unknown group has infiltrated one of the top secret server rooms of the OSS
translation.it: C'è stata un'intrusione in una sala server dell'OSS

translation.en: hidden deep inside a civilian office.
These guys look like professionals. Mm. We'll pay them a visit.
You know, because of our rules, at least Patty is very honest. Our restrictions make them do what is right,
translation.it: Grazie alle regole, Patty è molto onesta. Li obbligano a fare ciò che è giusto.

translation.en: so if we ban all of their tech, maybe they should behave even better.
translation.it: Eliminando tutta la tecnologia, forse si comporteranno ancora meglio.

translation.en: Look, all I'm saying is technology isn't doing them any favors. Know what I mean?
translation.it: Insomma, la tecnologia non gli sta facendo bene.

translation.en: -[beeps] -Someone's locked us out.
-Well, technology sure serves us well. -Hmm.
Okay. The most optimal path of capturing them all effectively is… is not that.
translation.it: Ok. Il modo migliore per catturarli tutti… non è quello.

translation.en: -You don't think so? -Don't be a bull in a china shop.
translation.it: - No? - Non farti prendere la mano…

translation.en: You know, we could have planned that just a little, babe.
Maybe ask one of these guys what the passcode is or something.
translation.it: Chiedere a uno di loro il codice d'accesso.

translation.en: You think too much. It's very cute though. Okay. [strains]
translation.it: Pensi troppo, ma sei molto tenero. Ok.

translation.en: You know, we can't just control our children.
We gotta let them fail. You know? A lot. Like we did.
translation.it: Dobbiamo lasciarli fallire, no? E tanto. Come abbiamo fatto noi.

translation.en: Through real-life experiences, absolutely, but not through their technology.
translation.it: Tramite esperienze di vita, non con la tecnologia.

translation.en: I mean, video games are never a real challenge. Wait, what's this?
translation.it: I videogiochi non sono una vera sfida. E questo cos'è?

translation.en: -"Defeat the Heck Knight to gain access." -This should be easy for you.
translation.it: - "Sconfiggi Heck Knight per accedere." - Dovrebbe essere facile per te.

translation.en: Ooh. Ouch. Well, he cheated, and two can play at that game.
translation.it: - Ahia. - Beh, ha barato. E posso farlo anch'io.

translation.en: Armageddon really does break into anything.
translation.it: Armageddon entra proprio dappertutto. Che c'è?

translation.en: This is odd.
These guys weren't actually searching for anything,
translation.it: Quei tizi non stavano cercando niente.

translation.en: so… what are they doing here?
translation.it: Ma allora… che ci fanno qui?

translation.en: Oh, I count four intruders. There was a fifth. That big one.
translation.it: Vedo quattro intrusi. Manca il quinto, un omone.

translation.en: [gruff voice] Armageddon is mine to claim.
-It was a trap. -Huh? It was a trap. They're after the Armageddon Code.
translation.it: Era una trappola. Vogliono il Codice Armageddon.

translation.en: -No. -Come on.
Oh, he's gone.
It's okay. Armageddon isn't stored on the watch.
Mom. You missed it. There was a Heck Knight. From Hyskor!
translation.it: Mamma! C'era Heck Knight! Quello di Hyskor!

translation.en: [kid's mom] Sweetie, wait up. Wait a minute.
What's Hyskor?
[host] This is the final round of our trading-card tournament.
translation.it: Ultimo round del torneo di carte collezionabili.

translation.en: The winner will receive a free copy of Hyskor,
translation.it: Il vincitore riceverà una copia gratuita di Hyskor,

translation.en: which, of course, is the sequel to the megahit video game Loskor.
translation.it: che è il sequel, ovviamente, del famosissimo videogioco Loskor.

translation.en: Players, are you ready?
[host] Let's play.
Lowest number wins. Beat that.
translation.it: Il numero più basso vince. Batti questa.

translation.en: Oh no. Or, as Rat Thickskull would say,
translation.it: Oh, no. O come direbbe Rat Thickskull…

translation.en: "Tough tacos, kid."
I'm impressed.
Congratulations, Tony. Type in your email and Hyskor will be sent to your home computer.
translation.it: Congratulazioni. Inserisci la tua e-mail e Hyskor ti sarà inviato a casa.

translation.en: Did you know the creator of Hyskor is this crazy awesome rich guy named Rey Kingston,
translation.it: Sapevate che il creatore di Hyskor è un riccone di nome Rey Kingston?

translation.en: but everyone calls him by his gamer name, the King.
translation.it: Ma tutti lo chiamano col suo nickname, Il Re.

translation.en: Check it out.
[narrator] And here is Rey Kingston to talk about how he does it.
translation.it: Ed ecco Rey Kingston che ci racconta come fa.

translation.en: My latest game, Hyskor,
is made using my new, flawless design method.
translation.it: è realizzato con un nuovo, perfetto metodo di design.

translation.en: That's a glitch right there.
But, using my proprietary… [computerized voice] VR pods.
translation.it: - Ma usando i miei originali… - VR Pod.

translation.en: …I'm able to design and improve the game
from the inside.
-With my mind. -[bleeping]
What?
[The King] I can make my game better so it can make you better.
translation.it: Miglioro il gioco affinché renda migliori voi.

translation.en: Will you look at that? -Better than ever! -[kids] Whoa!
And when you apply game theory, you can fix anything.
translation.it: E applicando la teoria dei giochi, puoi riparare qualsiasi cosa.

translation.en: Do you think the game will have the mythical One Hit from Loskor?
translation.it: Ci sarà il mitico Colpo Finale di Loskor?

translation.en: No. One Hit is a fable.
No, it isn't. Leebs and I were fighting a cheating player,
translation.it: No. Io e Leebs lottavamo contro uno che barava

translation.en: and I ran out of health, but then I got a gold star,
translation.it: e sono morta, ma poi ho ricevuto una stella d'oro,

translation.en: came back to life, and beat the player with One Hit.
translation.it: sono tornata in vita e l'ho battuto col Colpo Finale.

translation.en: That's impossible, Patty.
Hyskor's releasing at midnight, and I'm gonna play it all night long.
translation.it: Hyskor uscirà a mezzanotte e ci giocherò tutta la notte.

translation.en: My parents would never let me stay up that late.
translation.it: I miei non me lo permetterebbero mai.

translation.en: We're not allowed to stay up late playing games.
translation.it: Non possiamo stare svegli a giocare.

translation.en: You'll never make it past Mom and Dad's restrictions. Not without your help.
translation.it: - Non supererai mai le restrizioni. - Col tuo aiuto, sì.

translation.en: -You shouldn't have cheated. -But I won, didn't I?
translation.it: - Non dovevi barare. - Ma ho vinto.

translation.en: There's a better way to win. But I got Hyskor. I know you wanna play too.
translation.it: - C'è un modo migliore. - Ma ho Hyskor, e vuoi giocarci anche tu.

translation.en: [The King] The world is full of terrible, unfair people,
translation.it: Il mondo è pieno di persone scorrette.

translation.en: but, with the Armageddon Code, I can force them all to become good.
translation.it: Ma col Codice Armageddon le costringerò a diventare buone.

translation.en: [Heck Knight] We were unable to trace the Armageddon Code through the agent's watch.
translation.it: L'orologio non è servito a localizzare il Codice Armageddon.

translation.en: But I've learned what I needed. The Torrezes have the code.
translation.it: Ma so quello che m'interessava. Ce l'hanno i Torrez.

translation.en: Since it wasn't in the OSS, it must be at their home.
translation.it: Se non era all'OSS, è a casa loro.

translation.en: [Heck Knight] I will invade their home and claim the code for you.
translation.it: Invaderò la loro casa e ti prenderò il Codice.

translation.en: No need.
The Torrezes just won a copy of Hyskor.
translation.it: I Torrez hanno vinto una copia di Hyskor.

translation.en: Tonight, I'll claim the code myself.
Wha… It's… It's a brand-new house. Why are the floors squeaking?!
translation.it: È una casa nuova, perché i pavimenti scricchiolano?

translation.en: [Torrez] We picked this place for how it looks, not how it sounds.
translation.it: L'abbiamo scelta per l'aspetto, non i rumori.

translation.en: No way this is gonna work. Five minutes to midnight. Let's move.
translation.it: - Non funzionerà mai. - Cinque minuti a mezzanotte. Andiamo.

translation.en: How are we getting past the squeaky wood floor?
I tried mapping where all the squeaks are
so that we can sneak past Mom and Dad's office and get to the game room.
translation.it: per superare lo studio e raggiungere la sala giochi.

translation.en: But one creak and we're goners.
translation.it: Ma al primo scricchiolio è finita.

translation.en: -Wait for me! -Sh!
[Patty] One, two, three!
I feel like a spy. The worst spy ever. You talk too loud.
translation.it: - Mi sento una spia. - Saresti un disastro, parli troppo forte.

translation.en: -Your map is wrong! -It's not wrong.
translation.it: - La mappa è sbagliata! - Non è vero.

translation.en: -[Patty] Here, give me that. -[both gasp]
[Tony] Worst spy ever.
-[Patty] Worst idea ever. -[TVs chime] We're gonna get so busted.
translation.it: È la tua idea che è pessima. Ci scopriranno.

translation.en: [Tony] Dad changes his passcode every day.
-What now? -I found this in his desk earlier.
translation.it: - E adesso? - Era sulla scrivania di papà.

translation.en: [Patty] You have no soul.
Hyskor's downloading. Now we wait.
We are dealing with a highly intelligent enemy who knows about the Armageddon Code.
translation.it: Il nemico è molto intelligente e sa del Codice Armageddon.

translation.en: It's time we consider deleting it. Out of the question.
translation.it: - Va cancellato. - Non se ne parla.

translation.en: The code can break into any device on the planet.
Yes. Yes. He's right, babe.
Think of the times we've used it to save the world.
This is our greatest tool. It's also the world's greatest threat.
translation.it: - È il nostro strumento migliore. - E un'enorme minaccia.

translation.en: If there was the slightest chance of someone taking it, we agreed we would erase it.
translation.it: Avevamo deciso di cancellarlo se avesse rischiato di essere rubato.

translation.en: Your orders are to protect the code until we find a solution. No exceptions.
translation.it: Proteggete il Codice finché non troviamo una soluzione.

translation.en: What? He's right.
Do not look at me like that.
Or like that.
That's not so bad.
Download complete. Get ready for the ultimate game experience.
translation.it: Download finito. Preparati al gioco più bello di sempre.

translation.en: What if using Dad's passcode opens up some kind of reverse access
translation.it: E se usare la password di papà permettesse a qualcun altro

translation.en: where someone can break into our system?
Do you wanna play or not? One button-press away.
translation.it: Giochi o no? Basta premere il pulsante.

translation.en: [whispers] We'll be in so much trouble.
Worth it.
-Okay, do it. Wait. Don't do it. -[game music playing]
[game] Welcome to Hyskor. Reach the end of the world
translation.it: Benvenuto in Hyskor. Raggiungi la fine del mondo

translation.en: and defeat the last player standing to win the crown.
translation.it: e sconfiggi l'ultimo giocatore rimasto per vincere la corona.

translation.en: -Choose your character. -I pick Florella.
-You're playing her still? -But she's so cool.
translation.it: Ancora? È fantastica, e migliora andando avanti.

translation.en: She gets better as you work through the game.
translation.it: È fantastica, e migliora andando avanti.

translation.en: -I would've won by then. -With Rat Thickskull? Good luck. He's a jerk.
translation.it: - Io vincerò prima. - Con Rat Thickskull? È un idiota.

translation.en: No. He's the most ruthless, scheming, roguish rascal in the whole game.
translation.it: No, è il furfante più spietato e canaglia di tutto il gioco.

translation.en: And no one plays him better than I do.
translation.it: E nessuno ci gioca meglio di me.

translation.en: Okay, we, uh… We… -We move the code. We hide it. -It's a threat no matter where we hide it.
translation.it: - Ok, allora nascondiamo il Codice. - È comunque una minaccia.

translation.en: It's always been that way, ever since you created it.
translation.it: Lo è sempre stato, da quando l'hai creato.

translation.en: -We need to delete it now, Terrence. -No. N…
No, we just keep all home devices locked under maximum security. Ours, the kids'.
translation.it: Teniamo sotto stretta sorveglianza tutti i dispositivi, nostri e dei bambini.

translation.en: People are always going to be after the code. So you wanna just lock up our kids' lives forever?
translation.it: Qualcuno vorrà sempre rubarlo. Vuoi isolare i bambini per sempre?

translation.en: Yeah.
[Terrence] Babe. Uh…
I'm sorry. Just… We… We…
-We have to do this, you know? -Mm. It's better for them, for all of us.
translation.it: Dobbiamo farlo, ok? È meglio per loro, per tutti.

translation.en: -Thank you for understanding. -Mm-hmm.
Did you just sleeper-kiss me?
I'm sorry, babe.
But this is better for all of us.
Proceed with deletion of Armageddon Code. I'm gonna beat this game so fast.
translation.it: - Cancellazione Codice Armageddon. - Vincerò in un attimo.

translation.en: The King said that only good people can beat his games.
translation.it: Il Re dice che solo le brave persone vincono.

translation.en: -I am good. -That's not what I meant.
translation.it: - Io sono bravo. - Non in quel senso.

translation.en: [Patty] If you cheat like a rat, you will lose like a rat.
translation.it: Se imbrogli come un ratto, perderai come un ratto.

translation.en: For real.
[Patty] There's something wrong with this game.
I know that face.
Thank you. [Tony] I know that voice.
What's he doing?
Ninety-seven, ninety-eight, ninety-nine…
Wait, what?
What? It just shut down.
We should leave. I agree.
-Wait, how did… -[high-pitched trill]
-Armageddon Code is gone? -Deleted.
Good. It should have been done a lo-- Not deleted.
translation.it: - E avremmo dovuto farlo… - Non cancellato.

translation.en: Stolen. -What? -Right out from under us.
translation.it: - Rubato. Sotto al nostro naso. - Cosa?

translation.en: [Terrence] It's not erased, and it's not here.
translation.it: - Non è stato cancellato e non è qui. - Cercalo meglio!

translation.en: -[Torrez] You're not looking hard enough. -[Terrence] Maybe the kids did something.
translation.it: - Non è stato cancellato e non è qui. - Cercalo meglio! Forse sono stati bambini.

translation.en: [Torrez] Why are you always blaming the kids? They are very obedient.
translation.it: Perché li incolpi sempre? Sono obbedienti.

translation.en: Have you met our son? [Torrez] Yes! And they are asleep in their beds.
translation.it: - Conosci nostro figlio? - Sì! E stanno dormendo, li ho visti!

translation.en: -I saw it with my own eyes. -[Terrence] I'm gonna check.
translation.it: - Conosci nostro figlio? - Sì! E stanno dormendo, li ho visti! Vado a vedere.

translation.en: -[Torrez] Oh, are you? -[Terrence] Yeah!
Tony.
Right.
That can't be our fault.
Maybe someone stole his credit card or something.
translation.it: Forse gli hanno rubato la carta di credito.

translation.en: We should go to bed.
But what if we did something bad? Worth it.
translation.it: - E se avessimo combinato un guaio? - Ne è valsa la pena.

translation.en: -[alarm ringing] -♪ Wake up, sleepyhead! ♪
♪ Wake up! ♪
Something is happening.
It's all over the world.
-[whirs] -[game narrator] Hyskor challenge.
-Survive the perilous jump to gain access. -What is this, a game?
translation.it: - Sopravvivi al salto per accedere. - Cos'è, un gioco?

translation.en: -[character screams] -[narrator] Access denied. That's Hyskor, Dad. A game. But I can beat it.
translation.it: - Accesso negato. - È Hyskor, papà. Un gioco. Faccio io.

translation.en: -[narrator] Access granted. -Good job, bud.
Oh, the news is back on.
As of early this morning, large populations of the world
translation.it: Da stamani, gran parte del mondo

translation.en: are suddenly being forced to play games to gain access to their daily life.
translation.it: deve giocare a un videogioco per accedere alla propria quotidianità.

translation.en: Reports show people are being locked in or out of their smart cars, smart homes,
translation.it: Chiusi dentro o fuori dalle proprie auto e case intelligenti,

translation.en: and they have to complete fantasy game tasks to unlock even the simplest device.
translation.it: devono completare delle missioni per sbloccare qualsiasi dispositivo.

translation.en: I'm trying to get into my bank account, but I have to fight this Heck Knight.
translation.it: Per accedere al mio conto devo sconfiggere Heck Knight.

translation.en: I don't know what the heck a Heck Knight is.
[reporter] What's going on over here?
-We can't beat the game. -That's my friend Leebs!
translation.it: - Non riusciamo a vincere. - È Leebs!

translation.en: -[game narrator] Access denied. -Now we're locked out of our home.
translation.it: - Accesso negato. - Siamo chiusi fuori di casa.

translation.en: [reporter] Half of the planet has been affected by this virus, and experts agree that if it goes global,
translation.it: Metà del pianeta è stata colpita, e se la minaccia diventa globale

translation.en: the world as we know it could end.
translation.it: il mondo che conosciamo è a rischio.

translation.en: It's like somebody combined a video-game virus with--
translation.it: È come se qualcuno avesse combinato un virus con…

translation.en: The Armageddon Code.
-I think someone's trying to break in. -Come here.
-Someone else is in control. -[grunting] -[kids scream] -Go to the corner!
These are all enemies from Hyskor.
[Tony] Dad and Mom are actually cool!
Tony, play Hyskor to open the lock.

translation.it: Papà, non batterti con lui. È uno dei più forti!

translation.en: That's my TV!
Yes. I beat the game!
-You okay, baby? -I had it under control.
-Come on, go! -[Terrence] Go, go, go!
-What are these things? -Bad guys from our favorite video game.
translation.it: - Cosa sono? - I cattivi di un videogioco.

translation.en: [Terrence] That doesn't explain the living skeletons in my pool.
