translation.en: -Car. Ah! -No, no, no, no.
translation.it: L'auto. - La mia auto! - No, il rifugio.

translation.en: -That's my car! -Safe house, safe house.
translation.it: - La mia auto! - No, il rifugio.

translation.en: [Torrez] Right, right. Let's go. Go on.
[Patty] But I liked that car! -[Tony] We'll get another one. -[glass shattering]
-Where are we going? -[Torrez] Follow your dad.
All right, listen. Kids, your mother and I are, uh… Your dad and I have special jobs.
translation.it: - Ok, ascoltate. Io e vostra madre… - Facciamo un lavoro speciale.

translation.en: You're about to see some mind-blowing technology that might surprise you.
translation.it: Ora vedrete una tecnologia strabiliante che vi sorprenderà.

translation.en: [Patty] That's a wall.
translation.it: - È un muro. - La porta segreta non va.

translation.en: Why isn't the secret door working? Oh, no power.
translation.it: - È un muro. - La porta segreta non va. - Oh, non c'è corrente. - È uno scherzo?

translation.en: [Tony] Is this a dad joke?
translation.it: - Oh, non c'è corrente. - È uno scherzo?

translation.en: -Manual override. -Manual override.
-We have a secret door? -Ta-da!
[Nora] What?!
-[Torrez] Come on. -Me first?
-[Terrence] Yeah. -Whoa! Where does this go to?
-A room full of candy! -Let's go, honey.
[Tony] Is it safe?
-Completely. Why didn't we test this out? -We meant to.
translation.it: - Certo. Perché non l'abbiamo testato? - Era nei piani.

translation.en: [Patty] Hey, I don't see any candy!
-Whoa! -Yeah. Pretty cool, huh? [Terrence] Your chariot awaits.
translation.it: Non male, eh? La vostra carrozza.

translation.en: -Watch your head. -[seat belts click]
-Do we drive this? -Absolutely not.
The autopilot is designed to take you to a safe house. Press the start button.
translation.it: Il pilota automatico vi porterà al rifugio. Premete "start".

translation.en: [game] Complete the challenge to gain access.
It's asking if we're one or two players. This has to be a trick.
translation.it: Chiede se siamo uno o due giocatori, è un trabocchetto.

translation.en: -[Tony] This is Hyskor. Let's beat it. -[Torrez] Why don't we just tap through?
translation.it: È Hyskor. Giochiamo. - Premo dappertutto. - No, potresti fare un macello.

translation.en: No, no. Could be a red wire-blue wire situation.
translation.it: - Premo dappertutto. - No, potresti fare un macello.

translation.en: -[Torrez] Seriously? -Yes, seriously!
Done.
Patty, get to the safe house. There's something inside I need you to protect.
translation.it: Andate al rifugio. Lì c'è qualcosa che va protetto.

translation.en: -[Patty] How do I find it? -It'll find you.
translation.it: Come lo trovo? Ti troverà lui. Tienilo al sicuro.

translation.en: Just keep it safe till we get there.
translation.it: Ti troverà lui. Tienilo al sicuro.

translation.en: Wear this tracker so that we can locate you. Syncing.
Stay safe, and don't trust anybody.
translation.it: State attenti e non fidatevi di nessuno.

translation.en: -We don't wanna go without you! -[Torrez] You'll be safe. See you later.
translation.it: - Non vogliamo lasciarvi! - Sarete al sicuro.

translation.en: Babe!
Mom!
-No! -[Terrence] Kids!
-No! -[Patty] Tony. Tony!
No! Stay away from them!
[Patty] Mom! Dad!
[Tony] You're a much better driver than Dad.
[Patty] I'm not driving!
[Tony] Bad guys up ahead!
They're chasing after us!
translation.it: - Ci stanno inseguendo! - Falla andare più veloce!

translation.en: -[Tony] Tell this thing to go faster! -[Patty] Go faster!
translation.it: - Ci stanno inseguendo! - Falla andare più veloce! Va' più veloce!

translation.en: [Patty] They're up to something!
They're hacking our autopilot.
It's driving us to where the bad guys want us to go.
translation.it: Ci sta portando dove vogliono loro.

translation.en: We gotta go manual and get to the safe house ourselves.
translation.it: Dobbiamo guidare noi fino al rifugio.

translation.en: -Keep it on the road! -Whoa, check this out.
translation.it: - Non uscire di strada! - Ehi, guarda.

translation.en: The anti-crash bounces us right off obstacles.
translation.it: L'antiurto ci fa rimbalzare contro gli ostacoli.

translation.en: This thing controls just like that game Mecha Wings.
translation.it: Ha gli stessi controlli di Mecha Wings.

translation.en: Give me that. I'm the best at Mecha Wings.
translation.it: Dammelo. Sono la migliore a Mecha Wings.

translation.en: [Tony] You're going too fast!
-[Tony] He's got us! -Oh yeah?
We gotta lose them, or they'll follow us to the safe house.
translation.it: Dobbiamo seminarli o troveranno il rifugio.

translation.en: -Look out! -[screams]
How about some of this?
You're going right into them!
-That's the idea. -What?!
Just like Mecha Wings.
Turn there.
[Patty] You're going the wrong way.
That was kind of impressive, Patty.
Thank you.
Now let's just hope this "safe house" is actually safe.
translation.it: Ora speriamo che il "rifugio sicuro" sia davvero sicuro.

translation.en: Wait a second. I'm about to be really smart.
I think Mom and Dad are spies.
translation.it: Credo che mamma e papà… siano spie.

translation.en: You think?
We did something wrong.
This can't be it.
[Tony] So Mom and Dad are spies, and they sent us to the middle of nowhere?
translation.it: Mamma e papà sono spie e ci hanno mandati nel nulla?

translation.en: -[Tony] This must be a joke. -[Patty] Then why am I not laughing?
translation.it: - È uno scherzo. - Non fa ridere.

translation.en: [Patty] The water is so nice… and brown.
[Tony] Maybe we jump in.
[Patty] After you. [electronic voice] Your name?
Uh, Patty Torrez.
Tony Torrez. Your full name, please.
Uh, Patty Tango-Torrez?
My dad's last name is Tango, and my mom's is Torrez.
translation.it: Mio padre di cognome fa Tango e mia madre Torrez.

translation.en: -Your full name. -We never use our full names.
translation.it: - Il nome completo. - Non li usiamo mai.

translation.en: They're too long. Your full name, please.
translation.it: - Sono troppo lunghi. - Il nome completo.

translation.en: -[bleeping] -[Patty] The safe house is underwater?
[Tony] Either that or it drowned.
It's empty.
[Tony] This place is a dump.
-[both gasp] -Hey, kiddos.
We couldn't wait to show you the safe house when you were old enough.
translation.it: Volevamo mostrarvelo quando foste stati abbastanza grandi.

translation.en: If you're here now and by yourselves, that means something has gone terribly wrong.
translation.it: Se siete qui e siete soli, qualcosa è andato storto.

translation.en: But don't you worry. Mom and Dad are very close.
translation.it: Ma non temete, mamma e papà sono vicini.

translation.en: And if you haven't guessed yet, your father and I are spies.
translation.it: E se non l'aveste ancora indovinato, siamo delle spie.

translation.en: Hopefully, we will see you soon so we can explain everything. In the meantime,
translation.it: Speriamo di potervi spiegare presto tutto. Nel frattempo,

translation.en: choose your activity. There's comfort for sleep…
translation.it: scegliete cosa fare. Ci sono letti per dormire.

translation.en: -Cozy beds! -I get the top bunk.
…food for nourishment…
A little kitchen and snacks.
…gadget tutorials for a competitive edge…
[Patty] Spy gadgets!
This place is amazing!
…and spy training modules for self-defense.
translation.it: E moduli di addestramento per l'autodifesa.

translation.en: -[Terrence] Stand here. -Spy training!
-I'm gonna be the best spy ever. -[beep]
translation.it: Sarò la spia migliore di sempre!

translation.en: Hello.
-Move over. I'm coming down. -[Terrence] Lesson one complete.
translation.it: - Spostati, vengo lì. - Lezione uno completata.

translation.en: Always look out for traps. [Tony] Look at this place.
translation.it: - Attenzione alle trappole. - Guarda questo posto.

translation.en: [Terrence] Lesson two, ambush.
"Ambush Alley." This is easy.
Just like a video game.
Hee-hee. You did it!
[Terrence] Almost good.
I'm gonna try this one.
Avoid the lasers or you'll trip the alarm.
translation.it: Evita i laser o farai scattare l'allarme.

translation.en: Okay. Your turn.
-[grunts] -Failure! Please try again.
Failure. How come when you mess up, I get hit?
translation.it: - Hai fallito. - Perché se sbagli le prendo io?

translation.en: Um… because we're a team? Let me try.
translation.it: - Perché siamo una squadra? - Provo io.

translation.en: Failure.
Smart training system.
translation.it: - È un sistema intelligente. - Proviamo i gadget.

translation.en: -Let's go upstairs and do gadgets. -Okay.
translation.it: - È un sistema intelligente. - Proviamo i gadget. Ok.

translation.en: -Let's find a way out. -[groans]
Oh, did they hurt you, my love?
translation.it: Oh. Ti hanno fanno male, amore?

translation.en: No. No, no, no. They didn't. The sleeper kiss is what leaves the lingering pain.
translation.it: No. Sono gli effetti collaterali del bacio sedativo.

translation.en: I had to delete it.
-I know. -Okay. Then let's break outta here.
-Oh. -I'm gonna say that's a trap. At least we get to meet whoever's behind this. Come on.
translation.it: - Per me è una trappola. - Almeno sapremo chi c'è dietro.

translation.en: -So you're just gonna-- -Come on!
I'm sure they're gonna let us waltz right into where they are.
translation.it: Ma certo, ci fanno muovere liberamente.

translation.en: This is why we get in trouble. -You're impulsive. -Just stay close.
I am just asking you to use a little caution. Stay close.
translation.it: - Vorrei solo un po' di cautela! - Stammi vicino.

translation.en: [Terrence] Come on.
-[Nora] Hear that? -Yeah.
One, two, three.
-That's ominous. -Yeah.
-[Terrence] Very interesting. -[Torrez] Uh-huh.
Hi. Uh, excuse our appearance. We didn't realize it was Fantasy Friday here.
translation.it: Ciao. Scusa, non sapevamo del tema fantasy.

translation.en: [Terrence] Nice architecture, by the way. Very, uh… retro video gamey.
translation.it: Bella architettura, comunque. Fa molto videogame retro.

translation.en: As far as I'm concerned, the late 20th century was the height
translation.it: Per come la vedo io, gli ultimi anni del '900 erano l'apice…

translation.en: of visual technology.
It was all downhill from there.
Please sit down. Oh, there…
Trust me.
So, Rey Kingston,
one of the most powerful tech giants in all of history,
translation.it: gigante della tecnologia tra i più potenti della storia,

translation.en: using a virus to force everyone to play video games. Why?
translation.it: fa giocare tutti ai videogiochi con un virus. Perché?

translation.en: Well, the only true benefit in gaining power is to influence the world.
translation.it: Il vero vantaggio del potere è influenzare il mondo.

translation.en: There's no better way to do that than through your Armageddon Code.
translation.it: E il mezzo migliore è il Codice Armageddon.

translation.en: And you shut off half the world with it. Happy?
No, I'm not.
Yeah, Armageddon was supposed to allow Hyskor to break into every device on the planet.
translation.it: Avrebbe dovuto diffondere Hyskor in tutti i dispositivi del mondo.

translation.en: So why has it stopped halfway?
translation.it: Perché si è fermato a metà?

translation.en: -Try turning it off and back on? -That works.
[Torrez] Maybe just give it a smack.
Take it out… [blows] …right back in.
-You're not gonna help me fix it, are you? -Not a chance.
translation.it: Voi non mi aiuterete, vero? Col cavolo.

translation.en: There's other ways.
For the longest time, I've wanted to challenge both of you to a duel.
translation.it: È da tantissimo tempo che voglio sfidarvi a duello.

translation.en: -Why us? -I mean, are we that good?
No. You're not good at all.
If you win, you go free.
If I win, you fix the code.
translation.it: Se vinco io, aggiustate il Codice.

translation.en: Let's do this.
Sorry.
Babe!
The code I stole was complete.
translation.it: Il codice che ho rubato era completo.

translation.en: You must have split it the moment I took it from your home.
translation.it: Tu l'hai spezzato quando ve l'ho preso.

translation.en: Babe!
Failsafe mechanism, huh? To ensure it doesn't fall into the wrong hands?
translation.it: Un meccanismo di sicurezza. Perché non finisca nelle mani sbagliate.

translation.en: Wear this tracker so that we can locate you. So if her necklace is a tracker…
translation.it: - Con questa potremo localizzarvi. - Se la catenina è un localizzatore…

translation.en: Your kids have the missing piece, don't they? Stay away from my kids!
translation.it: - i vostri figli hanno il pezzo mancante. - Sta' alla larga da loro!

translation.en: -Careful! -[Torrez panting] Is this all just a game to you?
translation.it: - Attenta! - Per te è solo un gioco.

translation.en: It is.
And with game theory, anything can be fixed, even this sorry world.
translation.it: E la teoria dei giochi può riparare tutto, anche questo patetico mondo.

translation.en: Maybe your children will be a little more helpful than you.
translation.it: Forse i vostri figli saranno più d'aiuto.

translation.en: Let's find out.
[Patty] I get the top bunk now.
Spy fashion!
[Patty] We have all the time in the world!
Patty! It's a spy-suit generator.
translation.it: Patty! È un generatore di tute da spia.

translation.en: [Tony] I'm gonna try it.
[Patty] Maybe we should read the instructions first.
Oh no. You're a pancake.
translation.it: Oh, no. Sei diventato un pancake.

translation.en: Let me try!
[Tony] The world's coolest sister.
translation.it: La sorella più forte del mondo.

translation.en: [Terrence] Failure. Please try again.
Failure. Try again.
Super goop.
Sticks to anything once activated.
translation.it: "Una volta attivata, si appiccica a tutto."

translation.en: [Tony] What is that thing?
It says it's a "thought bubble."
Looks like you select an emotion
and, boom, your enemy is either laughing, crying, hungry…
translation.it: Selezioni un'emozione e boom! Il tuo nemico ride, piange, ha fame…

translation.en: "Cute overload"? [Tony] Gadgets are weird.
Ambush.
Almost good.
Wait a minute. I just remembered something.
translation.it: Aspetta. Mi sono ricordata una cosa.

translation.en: Mom told me that there was something very important here,
translation.it: Mamma ha detto che qui c'è qualcosa d'importante

translation.en: but that it would find me.
Aw! Look at you!
You're my favorite thing in the world now. I'm gonna call you Bronson.
translation.it: Sei già la mia cosa preferita al mondo. Ti chiamerò… Bronson.

translation.en: How To Be A Spy, author unknown.
translation.it: Come diventare una spia. Autore sconosciuto.

translation.en: "A good spy is a master of deception"?
"All spying is based on lies"? Really?
translation.it: - "Lo spionaggio si basa sulle bugie"? - Davvero?

translation.en: This book is awesome. Mom and Dad's job is to lie and break the rules.
translation.it: Che libro fantastico. Mamma e papà mentono per lavoro.

translation.en: I don't care if it's their job. They tell us to be honest, but they weren't with us.
translation.it: Non m'importa se è per lavoro. Vogliono che siamo onesti, ma non lo sono.

translation.en: It proves that telling the truth only gets you in trouble.
translation.it: Dire la verità ti mette solo nei guai.

translation.en: That's crazy. Telling the truth should never be a bad thing.
translation.it: Dire la verità non è mai una cosa negativa.

translation.en: Oh yeah? Look here. "A good spy never tells the truth."
translation.it: Dici? Guarda qui. "Una brava spia non dice mai la verità."

translation.en: I'll never be a spy then. Have fun with that.
translation.it: - Allora non sarò mai una spia. - Buon divertimento.

translation.en: I wish Mom and Dad were here now. Well, they're not. They're out spying.
translation.it: - Vorrei che mamma e papà fossero qui. - E invece sono fuori a fare le spie.

translation.en: -Tony, what if this was all our fault? -How?
translation.it: - Tony, e se fosse colpa nostra? - Come?

translation.en: You downloaded Hyskor last night,
and then it was all over the news, taking over the world. I guess that makes sense.
translation.it: - e ora si sta impadronendo del mondo. - Ha senso.

translation.en: Since we caused this game apocalypse, then we should fix it.
translation.it: Abbiamo causato l'apocalisse e dobbiamo rimediare.

translation.en: You mean take down the final boss? Like Rat Thickskull?
translation.it: Battendo il boss finale? Come Rat Thickskull?

translation.en: No, I'm saying that we save Mom and Dad so that they can stop the bad guys and save the world.
translation.it: No, salvando mamma e papà affinché loro salvino il mondo.

translation.en: That's the craziest idea I've ever heard.
So let's do it.
[woman] Children!
We're your parents' coworkers. Mom said not to trust anyone.
translation.it: - Lavoriamo coi vostri genitori. - Mamma ha detto di non fidarsi.

translation.en: -I say take 'em down. -What if they really are secret agents?
translation.it: - Attacchiamoli. - E se fossero vere spie?

translation.en: We can apologize later. Children?
You're our parents' coworkers?
-So you're spies? -Yes. We are here to protect you.
translation.it: - Siete spie? - Sì. Siamo qui per proteggervi.

translation.en: Well, according to your manual, a good spy never tells the truth.
translation.it: Secondo il manuale, una brava spia non dice mai la verità.

translation.en: So we don't trust you.
We gotta go right now. You're not safe here.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andarcene. Non siete al sicuro.

translation.en: But it's a safe house.
That's it.
Careful. They might have gadgets.
Here they come.
They could use some serious training. Yup.
translation.it: - Hanno bisogno di un bell'addestramento. - Sì.

translation.en: Spy training. -[Terrence] Stand here. -Ah!
Trap door! Failure.
Avoid the lasers or you'll trip the alarm. Failure.
translation.it: Evita i laser o farai scattare l'allarme. Hai fallito.

translation.en: Sorry. Try again.
[gasps] Thanks, Bronson. Now find us another exit.
[Tony] Watch your step. [agent] Oh! Try harder.
translation.it: - Attento a dove metti i piedi. - Impegnati di più.

translation.en: [Patty] You two look… hungry.
[Patty] Thanks, Bronson. Now let's get out of here before they eat the whole safe house.
translation.it: Grazie, Bronson. Andiamocene prima che mangino tutto.

translation.en: -[Patty] Mine. -[Tony] Boop.
[Patty] Come on, Bronson! You're part of the team.
[Patty] Too easy.
Yes!
[man] Nice try, kids.
I'm Devlin, OSS division. Your parents work for me.
translation.it: Sono Devlin, divisione OSS. I vostri genitori lavorano per me.

translation.en: We don't believe you.
Trust me.
Oops.
-You're coming with us. -[Tony] Huh? Oh.
We didn't know.
[Tony] He has two pairs of sunglasses. He's definitely a spy.
translation.it: Ha due paia di occhiali scuri. È sicuramente una spia.

translation.en: Hey! Watch the gadgets.
[Tony] There are no video games in this truck.
[Patty] Oh, look, in case anyone ever wonders where all the spies are.
translation.it: Guarda. In caso qualcuno si chiedesse dove sono le spie.

translation.en: [Devlin] Everything is a mess. Half the world got hit by a game virus.
translation.it: È un disastro. Mezzo mondo è vittima di un virus.

translation.en: Some things are working. Some aren't. Yeah, we noticed.
translation.it: - Alcune cose funzionano, altre no. - Sì, lo sappiamo.

translation.en: Cool spy boat.
That's actually a plane that's also a boat.
translation.it: In realtà è un aereo che fa anche da barca.

translation.en: It's complicated, kid.
It's one of our only vehicles that hasn't been locked down.
translation.it: È tra i pochi veicoli funzionanti.

translation.en: An OSS Super Ducky. Why is it so small?
translation.it: - Un Super Ducky. - Perché è così piccolo?

translation.en: Fits one adult. It's called secrecy. And secrecy is how we protect the world from our enemies.
translation.it: Ci sta un adulto. Si chiama segretezza. È così che proteggiamo il mondo.

translation.en: Now, come on. We're in a hurry.
[Patty] Well, maybe we wouldn't have so many enemies if we weren't spying all the time.
translation.it: Forse non avremmo tanti nemici se non spiassimo tutti tutto il tempo.

translation.en: [Devlin] Nice dream, kid.
Our entire system's been locked up for the past 12 hours. We can't access anything at all.
translation.it: Il sistema è bloccato da 12 ore. Non si può accedere a niente.

translation.en: How do we find our parents?
You got your vehicle working and escaped your house,
translation.it: Come troviamo i nostri genitori? Siete riusciti a fuggire, quindi pensiamo che possiate aiutarci.

translation.en: so we think you two have what it takes to help.
translation.it: Siete riusciti a fuggire, quindi pensiamo che possiate aiutarci.

translation.en: You want us to be real spies?
Don't get carried away.
I just want you to beat this video game so we can access our systems.
translation.it: Vincete a questo gioco e potremo accedere ai nostri sistemi.

translation.en: Take off the kids' cuffs so they can do what they do best. Play games.
translation.it: Via le manette, hanno un lavoro da fare. Giocare.

translation.en: -But they're dangerous, sir. -Just… Off, please.
-I told you games would come in handy. -Okay. Get in there, kid.
translation.it: - Visto? Saper giocare è utile. - Ok. Dacci dentro.

translation.en: We could never get past that part. Wow. That is great, kid.
translation.it: Qui moriamo sempre. Wow, sei bravissimo.

translation.en: That is… That's great. I'll take over from here.
translation.it: Sei… Sei bravissimo. Ok, continuo io.

translation.en: -I wouldn't do that. -Me neither.
I've played a few video games in my day. You ever heard of GoldenEye? Watch this.
translation.it: Una volta giocavo anch'io. Conoscete GoldenEye? Guardate.

translation.en: All right, just, uh… get it done.
translation.it: Ok, fai… quello che devi fare.

translation.en: The system's back online. Yeah, that's good work, kid.
translation.it: Il sistema è di nuovo online. Ben fatto.

translation.en: All right. Now we can start searching for leads.
Let's go, people. I wanna see some names.
Mom told me there was something hidden at the safe house.
translation.it: Mamma ha detto che nel rifugio c'era qualcosa.

translation.en: -Do you have something important, Bronson? -[Bronson chitters]
[Devlin] The Armageddon Code. But only a piece of it?
translation.it: Il Codice Armageddon. Ma solo un pezzo?

translation.en: Oh. Your parents were smart to split the code. This gives us a fighting chance.
translation.it: Bella idea, hanno diviso il Codice. Possiamo ancora combattere.

translation.en: What happens if the bad guy gets both pieces?
translation.it: Che succede se il cattivo ha entrambi i pezzi?

translation.en: Your parents are only authorized to use that piece. If the enemy combines them,
translation.it: Solo i vostri genitori sono autorizzati. Se il nemico li unisce,

translation.en: he'd infect every device in the world with his game virus. He'd be king of the planet.
translation.it: infetterà tutti i dispositivi del mondo. Sarà il re del pianeta.

translation.en: The King.
Devlin, we might know who your bad guy is.
Who?
[agent] Unauthorized access. Oh!
-[computer beeping] -Here it is.
[Tony] Rey Kingston. But everyone knows him as the King.
Someone broke into our parents' system and stole Armageddon.
translation.it: Qualcuno ci ha hackerati e ha rubato Armageddon.

translation.en: It could only have been the King.
His new game, Hyskor, is what you're seeing on every device across the world.
translation.it: Il suo nuovo gioco, Hyskor, è su tutti i dispositivi del mondo.

translation.en: The FBI already raided his game studio this morning,
translation.it: Stamani l'FBI ha fatto irruzione nel suo ufficio,

translation.en: but it was empty, and this King was nowhere to be found.
translation.it: ma era vuoto e lui non c'era.

translation.en: Well, in his games, he always hides the bad guy in a cool, secret lair.
translation.it: Nei suoi giochi, il cattivo ha sempre un covo segreto.

translation.en: People, how do we find him? I want suggestions.
translation.it: Come lo troviamo? Fuori le idee.

translation.en: Well, my mom gave me this to track us.
translation.it: Mia madre mi ha dato questo per localizzarci.

translation.en: So maybe we reverse-track her tracker?
That must be where your parents are located. And quite possibly the King.
translation.it: I vostri genitori devono essere lì. E probabilmente… anche Il Re.

translation.en: -Somebody else is in control. -It means the bad guys are gonna break in.
translation.it: - Qualcun altro ha assunto il controllo. - Sono i cattivi.

translation.en: From there, there, and there.
translation.it: Faranno irruzione da lì, lì e lì.

translation.en: -What? -Trust me.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Fidati, ci siamo già passati.

translation.en: -We've learned from experience. -Know how much money I pay for security?
translation.it: - Cosa? - Fidati, ci siamo già passati. - Cosa pago a fare la sicurezza? - Eccolo.

translation.en: There's one!
translation.it: - Cosa pago a fare la sicurezza? - Eccolo.

translation.en: [Devlin] Get Armageddon out of here!
Protect the code!
Mom told us that we have to keep this safe until she finds us.
translation.it: Mamma ha detto di tenerlo al sicuro finché non ci trova.

translation.en: Lasers.
Ambush.
Go!
-Whoa! Did you see that? -See what happens if you kick 'em.
translation.it: - Wow! Hai visto? - Tiragli un calcio.

translation.en: It did it again.
[Devlin] Give me that! Let the grown-ups handle this.
[Heck Knight] Give me the code.
[Patty] They're getting away!
-We need to find out where they're going. -Bronson, we need eyes on the Heck Knight.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo scoprire dove vanno. - Bronson, cerca Heck Knight.

translation.en: Devlin! Get up and go chase them!
You…
The bad guys are escaping on the lake.
We'll never catch them.
[Tony] You can do the driving.
But only OSS agents know how to drive this.
translation.it: Ma solo gli agenti dell'OSS lo sanno pilotare.

translation.en: -[engine revs] -Thanks, Bronson!
[Tony] I just remembered I get seasick.
translation.it: Io soffro il mal di mare.

translation.en: They're getting away! Our boat can't swim.
translation.it: - Li perderemo! - Questa barca non può immergersi.

translation.en: Yeah, well, their boats can't fly.
translation.it: Beh, le loro non sanno volare.

translation.en: Bronson, airborne mode.
[Patty] Bronson, here's the location we got from the necklace. Fly us there.
translation.it: Bronson, ecco la coordinate ricavate dalla catenina. Portaci lì.

translation.en: [Tony] Then we can get the code and save Mom and Dad.
translation.it: Recupereremo il Codice e salveremo mamma e papà.

translation.en: Why are you still reading that book? These are the cheat codes to life.
translation.it: - Ancora quel libro? - Sono i trucchi per barare nella vita.

translation.en: You shouldn't cheat the King. It'll backfire on you. Be smart and play fair.
translation.it: Se bari col Re ti si ritorcerà contro. Fatti furbo e gioca in modo onesto.

translation.en: -Doesn't work. -How can you say that?
Remember when we snuck into Dad's office and found that puzzle he was working on?
translation.it: Ricordi lo strano puzzle nello studio di papà?

translation.en: Uh-huh. The one that was really tricky to finish. When I solved it for him, I thought he'd be happy,
translation.it: - Sì, era difficile. - L'ho finito, e anziché essere contento

translation.en: but he got mad at me for sneaking into his work, saying I was dishonest.
translation.it: mi ha dato del disonesto e si è arrabbiato.

translation.en: Yeah. Then he put up the tech restrictions on all our stuff.
translation.it: E poi ci ha tolto tutti i dispositivi tecnologici.

translation.en: See? Telling the truth only got me in trouble.
translation.it: Visto? Dire la verità mi ha messo nei guai.

translation.en: Maybe at first.
But in the end, honesty always wins.
translation.it: Ma alla fine l'onestà vince sempre.

translation.en: King's lair up ahead!
-We're not slowing down. -Bronson, what's wrong?
We're gonna crash into that wall!
-That wall isn't really there. -Oh.
Polygon-based architecture.
Just like in old video games. This guy is living the dream.
translation.it: Come nei vecchi videogiochi. Il Re fa una vita da sogno!

translation.en: [Tony] No way.
This whole place is covered in some sort of AR overlay.
translation.it: Questo posto è rivestito da uno strato di realtà aumentata.

translation.en: AR? That hologram stuff that makes things look different than they are?
translation.it: L'ologramma che fa sembrare le cose diverse da come sono?

translation.en: Yeah, that stuff. Maybe these glasses can help us find Mom and Dad.
translation.it: - Sì. - Con gli occhiali troveremo mamma e papà!

translation.en: Don't take a nap.
We have to keep trying or stop the code so we can get back to the kids.
translation.it: Dobbiamo fermare il Codice e tornare dai bambini.

translation.en: Even if we can escape, I don't think I can stop this.
But you made the code. Can't you unmake it?
translation.it: L'hai creato tu. Non puoi disfarlo?

translation.en: Yes and no. Operation Fireball?
translation.it: Sì e no. L'Operazione Palla di Fuoco?

translation.en: Of course. We had to take down that villain Vargos.
We were supposed to destroy his lair and everything in it, but I found plans for this weapon.
translation.it: Dovevamo distruggere tutto, ma ho trovato un progetto.

translation.en: Plans for the Armageddon Code?
I… I brought the plans back home so I could finish building the code, but I…
translation.it: L'ho portato a casa per completare il codice, ma non…

translation.en: I couldn't figure it out. I failed.
translation.it: - Non ce l'ho fatta. - Come hai fatto a completarlo?

translation.en: -[Torrez] How did you finish it? -[Terrence] I didn't.
translation.it: - Non ce l'ho fatta. - Come hai fatto a completarlo? Non l'ho fatto.

translation.en: Tony did.
He doesn't even really know it, but he did.
translation.it: - Non lo sa, ma è così. - Com'è possibile?

translation.en: -How is that possible? -He got into my work somehow.
translation.it: - Non lo sa, ma è così. - Com'è possibile? È entrato nel mio lavoro. L'ha capito meglio di me.

translation.en: He knew the plans better than I did.
translation.it: È entrato nel mio lavoro. L'ha capito meglio di me.

translation.en: He finished what I started, and I built Armageddon on top of what he gave me.
translation.it: L'ha completato, e su quella base ho costruito Armageddon.

translation.en: I could've told him everything, but I scolded him and put tech restrictions up to protect the code.
translation.it: Invece di dirglielo l'ho sgridato e ho vietato la tecnologia.

translation.en: The kids don't even know that's why everything they love is being kept from them.
translation.it: I bambini neanche sanno che il motivo è questo.

translation.en: And this is all my fault.
That is quite a story.
I knew you were hiding something from me.
But it doesn't matter who made what.
translation.it: Ma non importa chi ha fatto cosa.

translation.en: I've taken the missing piece from your children,
and within minutes, the code will be ready to fire. [laughs]
translation.it: E tra poco il Codice sarà pronto.

translation.en: Your kids failed you. Or maybe you failed them.
translation.it: I vostri figli vi hanno deluso. O forse li avete delusi voi.

translation.en: So Tony made the code.
Now no one in the world can stop me.
Tony! Tony made it!
There's a computer behind this panel.
Bronson, we need your help.
Now we can download a map of this place.
translation.it: Scarichiamo una mappa di questo posto.

translation.en: Look. The prison cells are right by the King's VR pods
translation.it: Guarda. Le celle sono accanto ai VR Pod

translation.en: he showed on that video at school. I hear footsteps.
translation.it: - che ci ha mostrato nel video a scuola. - Dei passi.

translation.en: -[Tony] Just don't look down. -[Patty] I might've already looked down.
[The King] Armageddon is close to being combined.
Then it will be unstoppable.
The King is already combining the code. We have to find Mom and Dad now.
translation.it: Sta per ricomporre il Codice. Dobbiamo trovare mamma e papà.

translation.en: Those Hyskor characters are just AR overlays too.
translation.it: I personaggi di Hyskor sono fatti con la realtà aumentata.

translation.en: They're actually robots.
Those robots aren't so scary.
-We need to jump. -What? Are you crazy?
-[Tony] We need to jump. -No!
[Tony] Those things are totally scary. [Patty] This way to the prison cells.
translation.it: - Sono proprio terrificanti. - Le celle sono di qua.

translation.en: -[Torrez] Is that… -[Terrence] Our kids.
-[Terrence] Patty! -[Patty] Mom! Dad!
Oh, my babies!
Are you safe?
Stand back.
I'm setting my Magna Boots from pull to push.
translation.it: Setto i miei Magna Boots da "tirare" a "spingere".

translation.en: -[Torrez] Oh! -[Terrence] Well done! -[Terrence] Well done! -[Torrez] That's my girl. Oh!
translation.it: - Oh, sì! La mia bambina! - Ben fatto!

translation.en: I can't believe you found us. How… How did you even get here?
translation.it: Non ci credo, ci avete trovati. Come siete arrivati qui?

translation.en: Aw. Bronson flew us in the Super Ducky that we jacked from the OSS.
translation.it: Bronson ha pilotato il Super Ducky dell'OSS.

translation.en: -I am so proud… -That is… -…in this moment -…just beyond, my sweets.
translation.it: - Sono fiero di voi. - Siete stati bravissimi.

translation.en: [Heck Knight] Armageddon is combined. Launching in six minutes.
translation.it: Armageddon completo. Sei minuti al lancio.

translation.en: What now, master spies? The clock's ticking.
Actually, I have a really solid plan inspired by our greatest mission.
translation.it: Ho un bel piano ispirato alla nostra missione migliore.

translation.en: -Operation Fireball. -You got it.
What was this Operation Fireball exactly?
Our mission was to infiltrate the operation of an evil man named Vargos.
translation.it: Dovevamo infiltrarci nel covo di un uomo malvagio, Vargos.

translation.en: [Terrence] And we were able to infiltrate his lair by knocking on the door. You just knocked on his door?
translation.it: - E l'abbiamo fatto… bussando alla porta. - Bussando alla porta?

translation.en: -With a truck. -Big truck.
We used our gadgets to get past the guards.
translation.it: Abbiamo superato le guardie coi nostri gadget.

translation.en: Friendly gadgets?
I went to stop the superweapon while your mother negotiated with Vargos.
translation.it: Dovevo fermare la super arma mentre mamma negoziava.

translation.en: "Negotiate"? You mean "beat up," don't you?
That sums it up. I couldn't stop the bomb in time.
translation.it: Sì. Ma non ho potuto fermare la bomba,

translation.en: I had to stall just long enough… So that we can set our own bomb off instead.
translation.it: - così ho guadagnato tempo… - Per piazzare la nostra, di bomba.

translation.en: We wiped out Vargos's operation in one glorious… [both] Fireball.
translation.it: Abbiamo spazzato via Vargos con una gloriosa palla di fuoco.

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you more.
Awesome.
Not awesome! You could've found a better way.
translation.it: Per niente! Potevate trovare un modo migliore.

translation.en: I'd… Hmm? How?
You could've asked nicely to see Mr. Vargos.
translation.it: Potevate chiedere gentilmente di vedere Vargos.

translation.en: You could've used a thought bubble to keep the guards entertained.
translation.it: Usare un Emozionatore per distrarre le guardie.

translation.en: You could've gotten an understanding of his interior-design sense.
You could've intervened in his plan with a softer touch.
I guess we… could've considered that.
So that maybe instead of Operation Fireball, it could be Operation Peace and Harmony.
translation.it: E invece che Palla di Fuoco, sarebbe stata l'Operazione Pace e Armonia.

translation.en: -That's my child. -Yeah. Yeah. Certainly not mine.
translation.it: - È mia figlia. - Di certo non è mia.

translation.en: -[Heck Knight] Armageddon in four minutes. -We have four minutes left.
translation.it: - Armageddon tra 4 minuti. - Ci restano 4 minuti.

translation.en: I could come up with a fantastic plan if I had a map of this place.
translation.it: Potrei inventarmi un piano se avessi una mappa di questo posto.

translation.en: -Boop. -[gasps] Yes! Well done.
We have to get to these computer terminals to stall for time.
translation.it: Arriviamo a questi computer e prendiamo tempo.

translation.en: Let's go.
-[Tony] That's the whole plan? -Yup.
translation.it: - Andiamo. - Tutto qui? - Sì. Manderemo un segnale all'OSS. - Perché invece non battiamo Il Re?

translation.en: We're gonna buy some time to send a signal to OSS for help.
translation.it: - Sì. Manderemo un segnale all'OSS. - Perché invece non battiamo Il Re?

translation.en: -We stall when we can beat the King? -Armageddon is being armed.
translation.it: - Sì. Manderemo un segnale all'OSS. - Perché invece non battiamo Il Re? Armageddon è partito, possiamo solo rallentarlo.

translation.en: Nothing we can do now except slow down its final process. Let's split up.
translation.it: Armageddon è partito, possiamo solo rallentarlo. Dividiamoci. Io prendo Tony e tu Patty.

translation.en: -I'll take Tony. You take Patty. -They have Magna Boots.
translation.it: Dividiamoci. Io prendo Tony e tu Patty. Hanno i Magna Boots. Devono farlo loro.

translation.en: -They can access the branching path. -No, no, no, no.
translation.it: Hanno i Magna Boots. Devono farlo loro. - No, è troppo pericoloso. - Hai ragione. Venite qui.

translation.en: -It's too dangerous for them. -You're right. Come here a second.
translation.it: - No, è troppo pericoloso. - Hai ragione. Venite qui.

translation.en: We can do this. [Patty] Yeah.
-Okay. Hey, you two stick together, okay? -Okay.
-And stick to the plan. -[Patty] Got it.
We love you too!
-I immediately regret this. -So much.
-Yeah. We should go. -Yep.
-I need eyes in the hall. -On it.
[gasps] Tony, we gotta hurry!
[Tony] I'm trying to beat Hyskor to stall for time.
translation.it: Devo vincere a Hyskor per prendere tempo.

translation.en: You lost.
-I've got a new plan. -What new plan?
If we get to this elevator, we can stop the countdown.
That's not what they told us to do. We have to stick to the plan. We have to do whatever it takes to win.
translation.it: - No, dobbiamo seguire il piano. - Dobbiamo fare il possibile per vincere.

translation.en: I think you were right, Patty. About what?
translation.it: - Mi sa che avevi ragione, Patty. - Su cosa?

translation.en: We're not gonna make it.
That must be the central computer. I can use it to stop Armageddon.
translation.it: Dev'essere il computer centrale. Posso fermare Armageddon da qui!

translation.en: Wait a minute.
I know this.
I made this. You made the Armageddon Code?
translation.it: - L'ho creato io. - Hai creato il Codice Armageddon?

translation.en: Sort of. It was that weird puzzle from Dad's work, but it wasn't a puzzle.
translation.it: Lo strano puzzle nello studio di papà non era un puzzle.

translation.en: -It was the plans for Armageddon Code. -How are you gonna stop it though?
translation.it: - Erano i piani per il Codice Armageddon. - Come farai a fermarlo?

translation.en: The same way I solved it. The last part of the plan had a trick to it,
translation.it: Come l'ho risolto. Alla fine c'era un trucco.

translation.en: where you couldn't tell if it was completed because you had to do the same steps backwards.
translation.it: Non si capiva se fosse completo perché bisognava rifarlo al contrario.

translation.en: That's how I'm going to break it.
Okay. What do I do?
-Press that button. -Which one?
-We're out of time! -Almost there.
You couldn't tell if the code was completed or not.
translation.it: Non si capiva se il codice fosse completo o no.

translation.en: Tony, wait! Stop! It's a trick!
[Heck Knight] You have armed Armageddon.
[Tony] What?
I just stopped it. Wrong, Tony.
You've put it together for me.
-Mom! Dad! -Oh, the whole family!
You weren't able to complete the code yourself, were you? Even after you got the missing piece.
translation.it: Non sei riuscito a completare il Codice neanche col pezzo mancante.

translation.en: Only the true code creator can activate the world-conquering potential.
translation.it: Solo il vero creatore può attivarne il potenziale di conquista del mondo.

translation.en: I made this fake countdown so you, Tony, could combine it for me.
translation.it: Il finto count-down ha fatto sì che lo combinassi per me.

translation.en: Thank you.
We downloaded Hyskor last night and caused all of this.
translation.it: È colpa nostra, abbiamo scaricato Hyskor ieri.

translation.en: No, no, no. You just wanted to play a game.
You didn't cause this.
They did. And so did the rest of the world.
translation.it: È colpa loro. E del resto del mondo.

translation.en: Vargos was my father.
From Operation Fireball?
He was a genius that used his technology to make our home country a better place.
translation.it: Era un genio la cui tecnologia avrebbe reso migliore il nostro Paese.

translation.en: Sure, his head wasn't always in the right spot,
translation.it: Ok, non aveva la testa a posto,

translation.en: but someone could have helped guide him.
But you OSS agents laid waste to everything,
translation.it: Ma voi agenti dell'OSS avete distrutto tutto

translation.en: stole Armageddon as a weapon for yourselves.
translation.it: e vi siete tenuti Armageddon come arma.

translation.en: He would've improved the world with his creation.
But instead, my father spent the last days of his life in some top secret prison.
translation.it: Ma ha passato i suoi ultimi giorni in una prigione top secret.

translation.en: I never saw him again. I'm so sorry, but we can't let you do this.
translation.it: - Non l'ho più rivisto. - Mi spiace, ma dobbiamo fermarti.

translation.en: The only way to make this world better is by force,
translation.it: Questo mondo va migliorato con la forza.

translation.en: and my father's creation will do just that. Armageddon Code, select target.
translation.it: E sarà la creazione di mio padre a farlo. Codice Armageddon, selezione bersaglio.

translation.en: The world.
This entire broken planet will be fixed by Hyskor,
translation.it: Questo pianeta malato sarà riparato da Hyskor.

translation.en: a game that makes you a better person as you play.
translation.it: Un gioco che ti rende una persona migliore.

translation.en: Because I'm in control.
Enjoy your life of play. No.
translation.it: - Godetevi le vostre vite… giocando. - No.

translation.en: We did this all wrong. Yeah, we did.
translation.it: - Abbiamo sbagliato tutto. - Sì, è vero.

translation.en: I'm sorry I wasn't a good spy like you wanted me to be.
translation.it: Mi spiace, non sono stata una brava spia.

translation.en: No. I'm sorry, Patty.
translation.it: No. È a me che dispiace, Patty.

translation.en: With your honest heart, you are better than I will ever be.
translation.it: Col tuo cuore onesto, sei migliore di quanto io sarò mai.

translation.en: And you are so much more than I could have hoped for.
translation.it: E sei molto più di quel che speravo.

translation.en: I wanted to win, Dad, but I ended the world. No. No, you didn't, pal. You didn't. I did.
translation.it: - Volevo vincere e ho distrutto il mondo. - No, piccolo. Sono stato io.

translation.en: When you brought me the code, and I didn't tell you the truth.
translation.it: Non ti ho detto la verità sul Codice.

translation.en: I'm so, so, so, so sorry.
Hey. How about you two show us how to play this Hyskor game, huh?
translation.it: Ehi, che ne dite di farci vedere come si gioca a Hyskor?

translation.en: We got nothing else to do now that the world as we know it is over.
translation.it: È la fine del mondo e non abbiamo niente da fare.

translation.en: Wait. There might still be a way we can win this.
-Oh… -But we can't stop the King anymore. Well, not physically, obviously, but we can stop him virtually, can't we?
translation.it: - Ma non possiamo fermare Il Re. - Non fisicamente, ma virtualmente sì, no?

translation.en: Look. The King is using this VR pod to control Armageddon.
translation.it: Guardate. Controlla Armageddon da questo VR Pod.

translation.en: He is inside the game.
But if we use these VR pods,
translation.it: Ma se usiamo questi altri VR Pod,

translation.en: then we can beat him the same way you beat Hyskor.
Reach the end of the world, defeat the last player standing, win the crown.
-Yeah. -This sounds crazy.
It is crazy.
Yeah.
So let's do it.
I… I… I… -[Torrez] That's your child. -[Terrence] Wait.
-[Tony] Back. Patty, come here! -Patty!
Cute overload.
They're not so bad. They're just cute little beep-boops.
translation.it: Non sono così male. Sono dei teneri robottini.

translation.en: Can you help us play against the King in Hyskor?
translation.it: Ci aiutate a sfidare Il Re in Hyskor?

translation.en: You're right, Patty. He's controlling Armageddon from inside the game.
translation.it: Hai ragione. Controlla Armageddon da dentro il gioco.

translation.en: But if we beat him before he locks us out, we can save the world.
translation.it: Ma se lo battiamo, possiamo salvare il mondo.

translation.en: Here's my plan. We go in, but no cheats, no tricks, no rat skills.
translation.it: Ecco il piano. Niente trucchi e niente inganni da ratto.

translation.en: -We play fair together. -Wait, we go into the video game?
-Yeah. -I think we need to regroup.
-There's no time. -We should call the OSS agents.
translation.it: - Riflettiamoci. - Non c'è tempo. Chiamiamo l'OSS e comportiamoci da spie.

translation.en: Figure this out the spy way.
translation.it: Chiamiamo l'OSS e comportiamoci da spie.

translation.en: I'm not following the spy playbook anymore.
Patty's been right all this time. I trust her.
translation.it: Patty ha sempre avuto ragione. Mi fido di lei.

translation.en: -Then let's play. -Let's go.
[Patty] Dad, you know how you always tell us video games will fry our brain?
translation.it: Papà, dici sempre che giocare frigge il cervello, no?

translation.en: -Yeah. -If we lose…
-This game might actually fry our brains. -[Patty] Yeah.
translation.it: - Questo gioco ce lo friggerà davvero. - Sì.

translation.en: -Wait, what'd they say? -[chuckles] It's… She didn't…
translation.it: - Aspetta, che hanno detto? - È… Non…

translation.en: -We're gonna have fun. Let's have fun. -Okay.
We're trapped!
translation.it: - Siamo in trappola! - È un ascensore.

translation.en: No, Dad. It's an elevator. The game's about to start.
translation.it: - Siamo in trappola! - È un ascensore. - Ora inizia il gioco. - Tony, sei Rat Thickskull!

translation.en: Tony, you're playing as Rat Thickskull!
translation.it: - Ora inizia il gioco. - Tony, sei Rat Thickskull!

translation.en: -And you're playing as Florella! -Wait, what are these outfits?
translation.it: - E tu Florella. - Perché siamo vestiti così?

translation.en: The game made you play as a character called Tayanna. [Tony] And the game made you play as a character called Itza.
translation.it: - Sei un personaggio di nome Tayanna. - E tu sei Itza.

translation.en: Got it.
Here we are.
Where are we?
We're at the end of the world. The finale of the world's most challenging game.
translation.it: Alla fine del mondo. Il finale più difficile di tutti.

translation.en: The ground is cracking. We have to go now!
translation.it: Il pavimento sta crollando! Dobbiamo andare!

translation.en: -All right. -This game is not fun.
Step one,
we have to get to that giant statue to find the King.
translation.it: Arriviamo a quella statua gigante e troviamo Il Re.

translation.en: -[Terrence] Are you sure this is right? -[Torrez] Just keep up!
translation.it: - Sicura sia la strada giusta? - Corri!

translation.en: I'm working on it!
[groans] And there goes my back.
[Tony] Now we have to fight a few bad guys to get to the statue. [Patty] And with only nine minutes left.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo combattere contro dei cattivi. - E mancano solo nove minuti.

translation.en: Wait. Why are there so many of them?
[Tony] It's a game. It's more fun that way.
translation.it: È un gioco. È più divertente così.

translation.en: [Tony] If we fall, we lose.
[Patty] If we don't work as a team, we lose.
[Terrence] How do we not lose? Just think of this as an ambush.
translation.it: - Come si fa a non perdere? - Vedilo come un agguato.

translation.en: Goody.
[Patty] How about a skeleton?
translation.it: Che ne dici di uno scheletro?

translation.en: Two skeletons!
Use your bracelet. It's like a spy gadget.
translation.it: Usa il bracciale. È come un gadget da spia.

translation.en: -[Patty] See? -Whoa.
-[Tony] Use your hammer to hit, Dad! -Oh!
Your dad's pretty cool, huh?
Is that a flaming skull? [Patty] Get lost! You too.
translation.it: - Un teschio infuocato? - Sparisci! Anche tu.

translation.en: Flaming skulls!
Go, Mom!
Thank you, Mom.
I'll always have your back. -[gasps] Duck! -Whoa!
I upgraded. Look at you.
Florella gets stronger as you work through the game. She sure does.
translation.it: - Florella diventa più forte giocando. - Decisamente.

translation.en: So is that it? Did we win?
No. It's time for step two. We have to beat the last player standing.
translation.it: No, è la fase due. Battere l'ultimo giocatore rimasto.

translation.en: The King.
[Tony] But only one of us can go in to face him.
translation.it: Ma solo uno di noi può affrontarlo.

translation.en: The rest of us have to defeat his champion, the Heck Knight.
translation.it: Gli altri devono battere il suo campione, Heck Knight.

translation.en: [Patty] You're our best player, Tony. You're the only one
translation.it: Tu sei il più bravo, Tony. Puoi battere Il Re senza rimanere senza vita.

translation.en: who can beat the King without losing all your health.
translation.it: Puoi battere Il Re senza rimanere senza vita.

translation.en: What? We have health?
Yeah. Yours is low, Dad. Real low.
translation.it: Sì, e te ne resta poca.

translation.en: -Oh. I thought I was just losing weight. -No. Come on!
translation.it: - Pensavo di star perdendo peso. - No. - Andiamo! - Ok.

translation.en: I don't know if I can win this without my tricks or cheats.
translation.it: Aspetta. Non so se posso vincere senza trucchi.

translation.en: What if I lose?
Worth it.
[The King] Now, while everyone plays Hyskor,
I can improve the world.
Deleting all nuclear launch codes.
translation.it: Cancello tutti i codici di lancio nucleare.

translation.en: No need for that in my world.
And…
Hello. Another player ready to cheat.
translation.it: Ciao. Un altro giocatore pronto a barare.

translation.en: I've been watching your every move from this throne,
and as I have designed my games from here, now I'm designing Earth.
translation.it: Ora progetto la Terra come ho progettato i miei giochi.

translation.en: [The King] You are so impressive.
I don't think I could even stop you kids out there in the real world.
translation.it: Non potrei fermarvi nel mondo reale.

translation.en: But… in here,
I can never lose.
If you lower my health to zero, you win. But if I lower yours…
translation.it: Se rimango senza vita, vinci tu. Ma se resti senza tu…

translation.en: Careful, Tony. The staff is Rat Thickskull's worst weapon.
translation.it: Attento. La staffa è l'arma peggiore di Rat Thickskull.

translation.en: Well,
it's a good thing I'm not Rat Thickskull.
translation.it: per fortuna non sono Rat Thickskull.

translation.en: Because Rat's not good at a lot of things.
He's a scoundrel.
He does anything to win.
And that's why today,
I'm playing as myself.
Shall we?
[Tony] First of all, "the King"?
Really?
If you can create your own world, why not make yourself the king? [echoes]
translation.it: Se puoi creare il tuo mondo, perché non esserne il re?

translation.en: You'll become the court jester when I'm done with you.
translation.it: Ti farò diventare il giullare di corte.

translation.en: [Heck Knight] I cannot be defeated.
Well, remember me? Yeah. I didn't have this big ol' fist then, did I?
translation.it: Ti ricordi di me? Già. Prima non avevo questo pugnone, eh?

translation.en: Catch me…
[Torrez] Oh, baby.
Nice catch.
But I love you.
-We have to beat that Heck Knight. -Honey.
Let's do Operation Fireball, but not our way.
translation.it: Operazione Palla di Fuoco, ma non a modo nostro.

translation.en: [both] Patty's way.
-You have been such a great challenge. -We appreciate you.
translation.it: - È stato bello sfidarti. - Grazie mille.

translation.en: -Keep up the good work. -You're golden.
Stay back! Don't come over here!
-The ground is unstable. You'll fall. -[Heck Knight] Why would I trust you?
translation.it: - Il pavimento è instabile, cadrai. - Perché dovrei fidarmi?

translation.en: Because you can.
You did it. You found a better way. You saved the Heck Knight.
translation.it: Avete trovato un modo migliore. Avete salvato Heck Knight.

translation.en: [Heck Knight] Florella,
henceforth, I will follow you,
translation.it: D'ora in poi io ti seguirò,

translation.en: for your integrity is pure.
translation.it: perché la tua integrità è pura.

translation.en: We did our part, but we're running out of time. Tony has to win. Now.
translation.it: Siamo stati bravi, ma non c'è più tempo. Tony deve vincere, ora.

translation.en: -Whoo! -Yes, Tony!
-No! -What?!
[The King] Come on, Rat.
Use your tricks and cheats.
Tony's in trouble.
Dad, don't.
I have to help him.
Your father's breaking the rules!
Dad!
-No, Dad. I have to do this myself. -[whirring, beeping]
translation.it: No, papà. Devo farlo da solo.

translation.en: [Tony, breathlessly] No… cheating.
But I played fair.
translation.it: Ma ho giocato in modo corretto.

translation.en: It doesn't matter.
-No! -Oh no! No, no!
Victory is mine!
I never thought anyone would ever earn that.
translation.it: Credevo che nessuno l'avrebbe mai ottenuto.

translation.en: -The One Hit. -[Torrez] What?
[Patty] Tony just received the legendary One Hit, the mythical ability hidden within the game.
translation.it: Tony ha ottenuto il Colpo Finale, l'abilità mitica nascosta nel gioco.

translation.en: How did you…
Maybe because I played the game like my sister said.
translation.it: Ho giocato come farebbe mia sorella.

translation.en: I believe her now.
No. No. No! No!
-Yeah! -Yay!
[Tony] You lost.
You won fair and square, but I can't let you stop Armageddon.
translation.it: Hai vinto lealmente, ma non puoi fermare Armageddon.

translation.en: It's the only way to fix this world.
translation.it: È l'unico modo per riparare il mondo.

translation.en: You could have removed the One Hit from the game, but you didn't.
translation.it: Potevi togliere il Colpo Finale dal gioco, ma non l'hai fatto.

translation.en: Yes, but I stopped trusting this world to make itself a better place.
translation.it: Sì, ma non credo che il mondo possa migliorare da solo.

translation.en: The only way to do it is by force.
Your games never forced me to play fair.
translation.it: Non è stato il gioco a farmi giocare onestamente.

translation.en: My sister inspired me to.
So now we just have to inspire the world to be better.
translation.it: Dobbiamo spingere il mondo a diventare migliore.

translation.en: You know, instead of forcing everyone to be gamers like us.
translation.it: Non costringere tutti a diventare gamer come noi.

translation.en: Like us.
It's true.
You and your sister have shown that maybe we do have the power to inspire them.
translation.it: Tu e tua sorella mi avete dimostrato che possiamo… essere d'ispirazione.

translation.en: He's running out of time!
Shut down Armageddon.
Yes. Okay.
Yes! Yes, Tony! I knew you could do it.
translation.it: - Bravo, Tony! - Sapevo che ce l'avresti fatta.

translation.en: [Heck Knight] Tremendous effort.
Well done.
You showed me the goodness I thought I could only find in a game world,
translation.it: Mi hai mostrato una bontà che pensavo esistesse solo nei giochi,

translation.en: and I… I thank you.
-You've raised some wonderful children. -We did.
Congratulations, agents. You have defeated your enemy.
-What? -Now the King must face his sentence.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Ora Il Re sarà processato.

translation.en: -There's a better way. -What?
Throwing him in prison won't make him a good person.
translation.it: - Cosa? - La prigione non lo renderà buono.

translation.en: -Then where do we send him? -This is why we need to make a change.
translation.it: - E dove lo mandiamo? - Dobbiamo cambiare le cose.

translation.en: Inside his own game.
The only reason we won is because his game makes you better as you play.
translation.it: Abbiamo vinto perché il gioco ti spinge a migliorare.

translation.en: -Hyskor has all the guidance he needs. -That's not how we work in the OSS.
translation.it: - Hyskor lo guiderà. - L'OSS non lavora così.

translation.en: Actually, it is. Excuse me?
On page two of How To Be a Spy,
translation.it: Pagina due di Come diventare una spia dice che l'agente di alto livello

translation.en: it states that the high-level OSS agent that catches the enemy
translation.it: Pagina due di Come diventare una spia dice che l'agente di alto livello che cattura il cattivo ne decide la punizione.

translation.en: is best suited to decide their judgment.
translation.it: che cattura il cattivo ne decide la punizione.

translation.en: And because we caught the enemy and you didn't, that makes us the high-level agents.
translation.it: E visto che l'abbiamo catturato noi e non voi, siamo agenti di alto livello.

translation.en: -[character] Ooh! -[Heck Knight] Radical!
-Smart kid. -Yeah.
Therefore, the King will be locked inside his lair under OSS surveillance
translation.it: Il Re resterà nel suo covo sotto sorveglianza dell'OSS

translation.en: until he beats Hyskor. -[Heck Knight] Yes! [laughs] -[cheering]
translation.it: - finché non vincerà a Hyskor. - Sì!

translation.en: What should have been done for your father we're going to do for you.
translation.it: È ciò che avrebbero dovuto fare con tuo padre.

translation.en: You're saving me?
You'll be saving yourself by working through your own game.
translation.it: Ti salverai tu stesso proseguendo col gioco.

translation.en: And with game theory, anything can be fixed.
translation.it: La teoria dei giochi ripara tutto.

translation.en: Or anyone. Watch me on the screen.
Thank you.
I never thought our kids would show us how to be great spies.
translation.it: I nostri figli ci hanno insegnato come essere spie.

translation.en: They showed us how to be something better.
translation.it: Ci hanno mostrato come essere migliori.

translation.en: Devlin, two decades of service with you in the OSS has been an honor, but
translation.it: Devlin, questi 20 anni di servizio sono stati un onore, ma…

translation.en: Excuse me?
We'd rather figure out our own way to save the world.
translation.it: Salveremo il mondo a modo nostro.

translation.en: Honestly and together.
Sir. The Armageddon Code.
-Is this the only copy? -Yes, it is.
-[Devlin] We don't need it. -[chip crunches]
Not in the new OSS. You might like some of the changes we'll be making,
translation.it: Non nella nuova OSS. Cambieremo le cose. Vi piacerà.

translation.en: to turn the OSS into a more effective and honest job.
translation.it: L'OSS diventerà più efficace e… onesta.

translation.en: -[Torrez] Then we're staying. -See you at your desks Monday morning?
All of your desks.
All of our desks! Oh! So proud of you, buddies.
translation.it: Tutti e quattro! Sono fiero di voi, bambini.

translation.en: [Heck Knight chortles] Well played.
-[beeps] -Well, Spy Kids. Good morning, Devlin.
I have a little progress report on your last mission.
[reporter] Not only has the world gone back to normal, but the one who caused Armageddon
translation.it: Il mondo è tornato normale, e chi aveva causato Armageddon

translation.en: is now helping people with the use of technology,
translation.it: aiuta le persone a usare la tecnologia.

translation.en: calling himself the Court Jester.
He did it. He beat his game.
translation.it: Ce l'ha fatta. Ha battuto il suo gioco.

translation.en: You ready for more? -[Patty] Oh yeah. -[beeps]
translation.it: - Pronti per nuove missioni? - Oh, sì.
